GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Check for null pointer of pointer substream before dereferencing it

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 1f2e28857be1e5c7db39bbc221332215fc5467e3, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit d4cfb30fce03093ad944e0b44bd8f40bdad5330e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: pcm: Check for null pointer of pointer substream before dereferencing it
